description: This file defines the CartScreen widget for a Flutter app, featuring a shopping cart interface with item listing, subtotal, and navigation to checkout.

classes.name: CartScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays the shopping cart with list of items, total price, and a checkout button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the cart screen, including the list of cart items, total price, and checkout button.
